name: NSFW Image Gen Bot
tagline: AI image generation bot for creating NSFW artwork on Telegram
description: NSFW Image Gen Bot uses AI image generation models to create adult artwork based on text prompts. Users describe what they want to see and the bot generates images accordingly. The bot supports various art styles from photorealistic to anime, with customizable parameters for body type, pose, setting, and more. Premium tiers offer higher resolution and faster generation.
